title: Bajaj to launch first CNG-powered motorcycle on June 18, reveals MD Rajiv Bajaj
description: Rajiv Bajaj unveiled plans for Bajaj Auto's first CNG motorcycle on June 18, 2024, challenging Hero MotoCorp's dominance in the entry-level segment. The bi-fuel bike will run on CNG and petrol, with details like trademarked names still undisclosed.
